definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Opposition politicians blame the government, saying a river project has reduced farmland.
sentences.chinese: 反對黨的政治人物指責政府河川的計劃使得農地減少。

sentences.english: Rural land brought to market illegally is actualy a kind of reasonable system innovation.
sentences.chinese: 農地非法入市實質上是一項合理的誘致性的制度變遷。

sentences.english: There is a striking real contradiction of land compensation in our countrys requisition of rural land.
sentences.chinese: 我國農地徵用中有關土地補償費的現實矛盾十分突出。

sentences.english: North of town, however, agricultural fields and roads flooded.
sentences.chinese: 但法戈市北部的農地及道路無可避免地被洪水淹沒。

sentences.english: The land use after farmland readjustment without approval.
sentences.chinese: 一未經許可，私自變更重劃農地之使用者。

sentences.english: Chapter five is the thought of agricultural land management.
Crops grown on irrigated land are not dependent on the vagaries of the weather.
sentences.chinese: 生長於灌溉農地的作物不依賴於天氣的瞬息萬變。

sentences.english: Therefore, an alternative ownership institution should be the ownership of farming land by the owner-peasant.
sentences.chinese: 因此，可供選擇的農地制度應該是自耕農所有制。

sentences.english: The fluctuation of agricultural land use change in Shangrao County.
sentences.chinese: 上饒縣農地利用變化的波動性。

sentences.english: You must have a very large area under cultivation?
sentences.chinese: 看來你們一定有很大的開墾農地了？

sentences.english: The sustainable utilization of farming land is the base of actualizing sustainable development of agricultural production.
sentences.chinese: 農地可持續利用是實現農業生產可持續發展的基礎。

sentences.english: Most of the villagers survive off tiny plots of cropland.
sentences.chinese: 大多數村民靠小塊農地產出聊以爲生。

sentences.english: Framers stand in the disadvantaged position in the process of expropriating the cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 農民在農地徵收過程中處於明顯的弱勢地位。

definition: to clear a wild area for cultivation/to put under the plow
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
to suppress/to crack down on/to prohibit
